flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: I will show you step by step with pictures how to fabricate your own portable workbench. It's a perfect accessory for your working area for storage and also a perfect accessory if you want to be able to take your soldering or grindig tools with you if you are traveling or visiting someone and you really want your workstation with you.
guide.introduction_rendered: I will show you step by step with pictures how to fabricate your own portable workbench. It's a perfect accessory for your working area for storage and also a perfect accessory if you want to be able to take your soldering or grindig tools with you if you are traveling or visiting someone and you really want your workstation with you.
guide.summary:
Simple instructions how to create your own portable workbench.
A pretty small case that contains a large working area for soldering etc...
guide.title: Portable Workbench
